name: Pygocentrus Attack
description:
A bullet hell game where You play as a little fish while tons of piranhas try to eat You

CONTROLS:

WASD/arrows:   swim

left mouse+R:     reset

.........................................................

The piranhas appear in waves. In each wave more piranhas will appear

wave 1 - 0s

wave 2 - 15s

wave 3 - 35s

more waves if anyone shows proof for surviving 100 seconds or more

have fun (°▽°)
